alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 27 at 8:53AM CDT until March 27 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HARRISON AND NORTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 853 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lyman, or 8 miles north of Gulfport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Vancleave and Latimer. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
